content: बिंबः --बं {@--1@} The disc of the sun or moon; वदनेन निर्जितं तव निलीयते चंद्रबिंबमंबुधरे <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; so सूर्य°, रवि° &c. {@--2@} Any round or disc-like surface; as in नितंबबिंबः &c. {@--3@} An image, shadow, reflection; <ls>U. 2. 4.</ls> {@--4@} A mirror. {@--5@} A jar. {@--6@} An object compared (<ab>opp.</ab> प्रतिबिंब to which it is compared). --बः A lizard. --बं The fruit of a tree (which, when ripe, is ruddy and to which the lips of young women are often compared); रक्ताशोकरुचा विशेषितगुणो बिंबाधरालक्तकः <ls>M. 3. 5</ls>; पक्वबिंबाधरोष्ठी <ls>Me. 82</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>N. 2. 24.</ls>

बिंबः --बं {@--1@} The disc of the sun or moon; वदनेन निर्जितं तव निलीयते चंद्रबिंबमंबुधरे <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; so सूर्य°, रवि° &c. {@--2@} Any round or disc-like surface; as in नितंबबिंबः &c. {@--3@} An image, shadow, reflection; <ls>U. 2. 4.</ls> {@--4@} A mirror. {@--5@} A jar. {@--6@} An object compared (<ab>opp.</ab> प्रतिबिंब to which it is compared). --बः A lizard. --बं The fruit of a tree (which, when ripe, is ruddy and to which the lips of young women are often compared); रक्ताशोकरुचा विशेषितगुणो बिंबाधरालक्तकः <ls>M. 3. 5</ls>; पक्वबिंबाधरोष्ठी <ls>Me. 82</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>N. 2. 24.</ls>
